name: Neurogen Art v1.0
description:
I am pleased to introduce you to my new model, Neurogen Art.

This model, unlike the classic Neurogen, does not pursue photorealism, but is instead designed with an emphasis on artistry.


Follow me: Instagram | Telegram

Support me: Boosty

Optimal settings:
Sampler: Euler A or DPM++ 2M Karras with 25 - 30 steps

CFG Scale: 6 - 7.5

CLIP skip: 1 - 3
